work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Wrote clean, modular SaaS single-page applications in an agile environment. Developed highly interactive web app utilizing JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, React.js, Next.js integrating RESTful APIs and Firebase, ensuring high performance on Mobile and Desktop. Experience with relational databases and NoSQL databases (MySql, MongoDB, Firestore). Debug, and refactor existing implementations and software modules as required. Lead initiatives to discuss architecture and API design patterns for mid/long-term developments. Actively manage, improve, and monitor cloud infrastructure on Heroku, AWS, EC2, S3, ElasticSearch, including backups, patches, and scaling

projects.title: BlockDoc
